Project Management
Need professional help to design, plan, supervise and manage your home construction project? Our project management consultancy service is ideal for you.
Book a free consultation to know more.
What You Get
Unlimited CustomizationWe give you complete choice in everything from core materials to finishes and fittings.
Personalized DesignsYou can get your own designs from other architects or let our experienced in-house architects design your dream house just the way you want it.
Budget PlanningWe provide detailed costing with bills of quantities so that you can plan in advance.
Project Scheduling & TrackingYou will get a detailed project schedule with timelines for every activity till completion. You will also receive regular updates from the site to help you track progress.
Full TransparencyYou will know the exact cost for each selection and pay only for what you choose. We will submit bills for all material and labour expenses incurred.
Quality ControlWe follow QuaSet; a thorough 250+ point quality control checklist to ensure that your home gets the top most level of workmanship.
Site ManagementOur experienced engineers will supervise the entire construction from start to finish. Everything from labour management to material sourcing will be handled by us.
How Is It Different?
Project Management ContractConstruction Contract
Costing
  • Transparent Project Management fee % given upfront to Clients
  • Project Management fee based on built up area
  • Once floor plans are final, exact fee amount is fixed irrespective of total project cost
  • Contractor profit % will be on total project cost
  • With any increase in project cost due to premium materials, contractor profit is added
Customization
  • Fully customizable at every stage
  • Free to choose all materials
  • Unlimited changes and additions can be made at any stage of construction
  • Limited customization allowed only in the planning stage
  • Fixed budget for every material
  • Changes are discouraged once construction starts
Payment
  • Smaller periodic payments
  • More control over expenses
  • Large stagewise payments
  • Expenses are part of contract amount
Ideal forClients who are looking for more customization and freedom to select materialsClients whose priority is pre fixed specification and budget
